article.title: BAE to Provide Guidance Sections for Advanced Precision Kill Weapons
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems Information and Electronics, Nashua, New Hampshire, is being awarded a $28,070,530 firm-fixed-price contract for 985 Advanced Precision Kill Weapon System (APKWS) II WGU-59/B guidance sections, and Navy shipping and storage containers; and support technical data for the APKWS II WGU-59/B guidance sections. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
